traits.Brave: The adept has advantage on any saving throws against being frightened.
traits.Halfling Nimbleness: The adept can move through the space of a medium of larger creature.
traits.Unarmored Defense: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Wisdom modifier.

actions.Multiattack: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.
actions.Unarmed Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:
actions.Dart: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
